page.title: 12The Montagus of Kimbolton
page.content: During the assembling of this material the{11th.Duke of Manchester}(i.e. God manchester),Sidney Montagu,died and his ashes were placed in the family vault beneath the parish church.This family came originally to Kimbolton in 1615 and the second Earl played an important part in the{Civil War.}The first Duke was created in 1719.The considerable estate accumulated has gradually been fragmented during this century.The family moved to Kenya in 1945 and the Castle was sold to Kimbolton School in 1950 for Â£12,500 and the remaining 3244 acres of land-holding to{Boots Pension Fund} in 1970 for Â£1m.Consequently Kimbolton has lost the seigneurial influence that pre-dates 1066.Older residents still miss this social focus which provided latterly a gentle benevolent despotism.
